website_summaries.verdict: For the best in still photographs, sound recording, and video, the excellent craftsmanship of this high-end digital camera is designed for serious artists.
pros: photos can be shot in RAW or JPEG format
The viewfinder is larger than in any other camera in its class
Comes with battery, charger, and lens cap
Users find it has a much faster response time than similar models
cons: High price tag will dissuade most casual photographers
The fixed lens means there's no zoom

website_summaries.verdict: The Leica Q (Typ 116) is a niche camera, with a full-frame image sensor and a dedicated 28mm lens. It's not for every photographer, but it's fantastic at what it does.
cons: Touch screen focus could be better implemented

customer_reviews.title: Old school charm with modern features.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It gets out of the way and lets you shoot. It hits all the checkmarks: Great lens, manual dials, good low light performance, fast autofocus, super high-resolution EVF with no apparent lag, etc. My favorite feature is all the features they decided to leave out, especially the million function buttons most cameras have today. It has all the old school charm of a film camera with some well executed modern features.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M Hegyessy

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful small camera with incredible IQ!
customer_reviews.text: Great little camera - reminds me of shooting my M6 film camera back in the day - incredible focusing and the lens is brilliant!
customer_reviews.author: S. Powell

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous camera
customer_reviews.text: Should have invested in this camera years ago! Incredible camera! Simple but with incredible versatility. I’m now a believer of Leica technology!
customer_reviews.author: David V.

customer_reviews.title: The Best Camera I have Ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: My Dad always wanted a Leica. I was always in awe of them, and that awe is not misplaced. This camera is a delight. It is so simple to use. unlike a complex Nikon=Direct to=Sensor. It has very few controls, allowing one to spend ones time composing the picture, rather than fiddling with variables.
customer_reviews.author: Fitz Park

customer_reviews.title: Wowzers.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice camera. Easy enough to use. I did read through the manual and I do know a little about settings so that helped. I really like this thing. This is, by far, the nicest camera I have ever owned but I have only had it for a little over a month. After we get back from Africa I would like to be able to update this review and tell more about how the camera held up.
customer_reviews.author: Onion Okray - Plover, WI

customer_reviews.title: Great camera ... but expected nothing less
customer_reviews.text: Exceptional build quality ... feels good in my hands. Intuitive controls once familiar with structure. Outstanding picture quality. Wish it had a couple more programmable function buttons and a built-in flash for fill in shots. External flash makes unit top-heavy. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: J Duncan

customer_reviews.title: a wonderful camera. great dynamic range
customer_reviews.text: a wonderful camera. great dynamic range, great autofocus, great image quality, beautiful colors, compact and easy to travel with.
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: just great performance. haven't rated the SF 26 flash yet ...
customer_reviews.text: How could one not give this camera a 5 star! just great performance. haven't rated the SF 26 flash yet and not sure I needed it with the results the camera gets in low light!!!
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Leica Q is very good camera The lens is of very high quality
customer_reviews.text: Leica Q is very good camera The lens is of very high quality. With some practice, I think it is easy to use So far all photos taken with the Leica Q have been accurately focused. Even in dim light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: Frederic J.

customer_reviews.title: A piece of art
customer_reviews.text: Amazing camera! The best I've ever owned. Expensive but well worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Image
customer_reviews.text: what is the most impressive part of the camera folks ? to me only the lens ,amazing clarity and contrast even in really low aperture ,also the dof as well is soft and beautiful looking .The rest i am not impress at all ,focus is not very precise ,many times it wont focus where you want ,battery is lousy and final dynamic range is not anything you expect from a full frame camera ,i think my Mark 3 has better
customer_reviews.author: Yiannis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice camera, don't let its small size fool you. it can stand on its own against any DSLRs.
customer_reviews.text: I switched from a Canon 6D to this camera and loving it, image quality is excellent and LightRoom supports the raw DNG files at 24 megapixels with ease. it is becoming my favorite travel camera. The fact that its non-changeable lens at 28mm doesn't bother me at all, however, it may be a consideration for some. Overall I have no complaints about this camera and I've owned it since 2016.
customer_reviews.author: Lilikoa

customer_reviews.title: Nice shots in the right hands
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 31 of these cameras for each of the children in a underprivileged kindergarten so they could capture all of their lives with crystal clear photos to last a lifetime, all of the cameras ended up at the local pawn shop within 30 minutes of the kids taking them home apparently these extremely poor people do not care about preserving lifes laughs, loves and precious moments.
customer_reviews.author: Ballzdeep

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Nothing beats a Leica and Leica optics. Coupled with a full frame sensor, I get razor sharp pictures.
customer_reviews.author: TWS

customer_reviews.title: Price premium on Leica q
customer_reviews.text: The reason for the high prices is this camera is on back order. Whoever has one, can charge premium for selling it now. I have one back ordered from B&H for the last month now.
customer_reviews.author: Juraj Kosco

product_meta.title: Leica Q 24.2 Megapixel Digital 35 MM Compact Camera (Black, Anodized, TYP 116)
product_meta.description: Color:BlackCombine what is technically possible with what makes sense photographically. A philosophy that leads to innovation, rewriting photographic history again and again. As it has with the new Leica Q, a digital camera which continues this groundbreaking Leica tradition with a full-frame sensor and a fixed focal length. Whether your subject involves depth of field, an available-light situation or a macro photography shot, the Summilux 28mm f/1. 7 ASPH. provides everything you need to express yourself photographically. Its classic 28mm focal length is perfect for street, architectural and landscape photography. Its lens, the fastest in its class, combined with a specially designed 24 MP CMOS full-frame sensor, provides detailed images of unsurpassed quality: up to ISO 50, 000. Main features: Optical compensation system for photo and video recordings3" TFT LCD monitor with approx. 1, 040, 000 pixels, touch control possibleContrast-based autofocus systemColor depth 14 bitDNG/JPEG resolution: Focal length 28 mm: megapixels (6000x4000 pixels), megapixels (4272x2848 pixels), megapixels (2976x1984 pixels), megapixels (1600x1080 pixels). Focal length 35 mm: megapixels (4800x3200 pixels), megapixels (3424x2288 pixels), megapixels (2384x1592 pixels), megapixels (1280x856 pixels). Focal length 50 mm: megapixels (3360x2240 pixels), megapixels (2400x1600 pixels), megapixels (1680x1120 pixels), megapixels (896x600 pixels).

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars49 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
